description:
Now you can be just one click away from all of the great local and regional content provided by the Chattanooga Times Free Press.
Anywhere – Now, no matter where you are you can stay connected locally, regionally and nationally with your mobile phone.
Anytime – Find the latest headlines, business, sports and more as it update every 30 minutes, 24/7.
The Chattanooga Times Free Press App provides breaking news, weather, sports, entertainment and business coverage for the Tri-State area: Tennessee, Georgia and Alabama.
The Chattanooga Times Free Press application includes:
-	Latest breaking news and photos
-	Sports coverage including exclusive UT, UTC, UGA and our local Preps   coverage
-	Business news
-	Politics and in-depth coverage 
-	Opinion
-	Entertainment news
-	Obituaries
-	Local Video and Photos
